name: Hikari’s Journey 光の旅 — the umbral world (Jam Version)
name_original: Hikari’s Journey 光の旅 — the umbral world (Jam Version)
description:
This is the original jam version. You can find an updated version here.

Play as Hikari, a dim light awakening in a unstable world of darkness. Surrounded by abstract shapes Hikari has to recover their speech and memory. But hardships lie hidden in Hikari's memories. Will Hikari be able to overcome their trauma and escape this world?

The game is split into multiple smaller games, which each constitute a chapter of Hikari's journey to overcome their faults and to find out who they are. Between these games, you will have to click ‘Run Game’ again on the itch.io page.

Content warning: Topics may touch on anxiety, substance abuse and depression.

Credits:

Game Design, Graphics, Programming Junber Writing, Game Design NonSans Music Steamdr4gon
